objects.text:
• Advanced 3-axis stabilization
• 360° rotation capability
• Intuitive control panel
• Durable aluminum construction

product_details.name: RONIN Professional Camera Stabilizer - Ultimate Cinematic Gimbal for Content Creators
product_details.description:
• 🎥 Advanced 3-axis stabilization technology for buttery-smooth footage
• 📱 Built-in control panel with LED screen for quick access to settings
• 🔄 360-degree rotation capability for creative shooting angles
• 🏃‍♂️ Ergonomic handle design for comfortable extended use
• 🔋 Long-lasting battery performance for extended shooting sessions
• 📸 Universal camera mount compatible with multiple camera models
• 🦶 Foldable tripod base for stable stationary shots
• ⚡ Quick-release plate system for rapid camera mounting
• 🎮 Intuitive joystick control for precise camera movements
• 💪 Durable aluminum construction for professional reliability

banner_details:
The banner design features a high-tech advertising layout tailored for a professional camera stabilizer product. The background consists of a dark gradient with angular geometric overlays and subtle design details like soft lines and semi-transparent decorative circles. On the left side, there's a strong typographic hierarchy starting with a bold, wide uppercase heading (`heading`) in white, followed by a vibrant red subheading (`subheading`) promoting the product category, all in techno-styled fonts evoking precision and innovation. Below is a descriptive set of bullet points (`description`) in light gray. Prominently positioned is the white price tag (`price`), with a red rectangular call-to-action button beneath (`cta_background` and `cta`). The right section is dominated by a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) that visually balances the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Graphite Grey: `#2A2A2A`
- Medium Grey: `#424242`, `#616161`
- Crimson Red: `#D32F2F`
- Light Grey Text: `#E0E0E0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a DJI Ronin camera gimbal in a sleek, matte gray finish that exudes a professional and modern aesthetic. The predominant color is a cool, industrial gray (#B5B5B5), harmonized with darker accents like charcoal black (#3A3A3A) for buttons and engraved text, adding a sense of depth and contrast. Small red highlights (#D94F4F) on buttons introduce a pop of color and functionality. The overall design uses monochromatic tones with subtle shading to enhance dimensional detail. For an advertisement banner, a minimalistic palette of gray, charcoal, black, and red provides a sophisticated, tech-forward feel compatible with the product's tone.
